provider.description: The description of a Provider of Services, i.e. a server node

description.description: More detailed information about the provider
More detailed information about the service

url.description: Web address for more information about the service

resource.description: The description for the location and type of a data object e.g. file, url,  etc.

protocol.description: The protocol identifier e.g. http, file, dropbox, etc.

value.description: The path of the data object

parameter.description: The full description of a parameter, this extends upon the API used by Swagger. See http://swagger.io/ for more information.

type.description: The type of the parameter as defined by Swagger

wheatis_type.description: A more finely-grained description of the parameter type. See ParameterType in services/lib/include/parameter.h

current_value.description: The current value of the Parameter

default.description: The default value of the Parameter

enum.description: A list of the only valid values that this Parameter can take

operation.description: The description of an Operation. See http://swagger.io/ for more information.

summary.description: A brief summary of the operation

operationId.description: A friendly name of the operation

description.description: A longer description of the operation, github-flavored markdown is allowed.

credentials.description: A collection describing a user's access tokens, passwords, etc. for given handlers/services

name.description: The name of the handler or authentication provider

key.description: A longer description of the operation, github-flavored markdown is allowed.

secret.description: A brief summary of the operation

username.description: A friendly name of the operation

password.description: A longer description of the operation, github-flavored markdown is allowed.
